content.text: Learn how to create a responsive form with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a responsive form with CSS.

content.text: Resize the browser window to see the effect (the labels and inputs will stack on top of each other instead of next to each other on smaller screens):
content.html: Resize the browser window to see the effect (the labels and inputs will stack on top of each other instead of next to each other on smaller screens):

content.text: How To Create a Responsive Form
Use a <form> element to process the input. You can learn more about this in our PHP tutorial.
content.html: Use a <form> element to process the input. You can learn more about this in our PHP tutorial.

content.text: Add inputs (with a matching label) for each field, and wrap a <div> element around each label and input to set a specified width with CSS:
content.html: Add inputs (with a matching label) for each field, and wrap a <div> element around each label and input to set a specified width with CSS:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
<input 
  type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">
type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name.."

<input 
  type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">
type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name.."

content.code_html:
<div class="container">
  <form action="action_page.php">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-25">
        <label for="fname">First Name</label>
      </div>
      <div class="col-75">
        <input type="text" id="fname" name="firstname" placeholder="Your name..">
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-25">
        <label for="lname">Last Name</label>
      </div>
      <div class="col-75">
        <input type="text" id="lname" name="lastname" placeholder="Your last name..">
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-25">
        <label for="country">Country</label>
      </div>
      <div class="col-75">
        <select id="country" name="country">
          <option value="australia">Australia</option>
          <option value="canada">Canada</option>
          <option value="usa">USA</option>
        </select>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-25">
        <label for="subject">Subject</label>
      </div>
      <div class="col-75">
        <textarea id="subject" name="subject" placeholder="Write something.." style="height:200px"></textarea>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <input type="submit" value="Submit">
    </div>
  </form>
</div>

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* Style inputs, select elements and textareas */

/* Style the 
  label to display next to the inputs */

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Style inputs, select elements and textareas */

/* Style the 
  label to display next to the inputs */

content.code_html:
/* Style inputs, select elements and textareas */
input[type=text], select, textarea{
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  resize: vertical;
}

/* Style the label to display next to the inputs */
label {
  padding: 12px 12px 12px 0;
  display: inline-block;
}

/* Style the submit button */
input[type=submit] {
  background-color: #04AA6D;
  color: white;
  padding: 12px 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  cursor: pointer;
  float: right;
}

/* Style the container */
.container {
  border-radius: 5px;
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
  padding: 20px;
}

/* Floating column for labels: 25% width */
.col-25 {
  float: left;
  width: 25%;
  margin-top: 6px;
}

/* Floating column for inputs: 75% width */
.col-75 {
  float: left;
  width: 75%;
  margin-top: 6px;
}

/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}

/* Responsive layout - when the screen is less than 600px wide, make the two columns stack on top of each other instead of next to each other */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  .col-25, .col-75, input[type=submit] {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 0;
  }
}
